Class AuxDrawer2D.LabelFieldPortrayal2D

java.lang.Object
sim.portrayal.FieldPortrayal

AuxDrawer2D
private static class AuxDrawer2D.LabelFieldPortrayal2D
extends sim.portrayal.FieldPortrayal2D
Wrapper for MASON class that changes font style.
